It's time to go to school.
What do you mean not for you?
But Mom made a lunch for you and packed it in this new lunch box.
Mom bought me a new lunch box?
Well, if Mom went through all of that trouble...
...and expense of getting me a new lunch box, I better go to school.
But that's the only reason I'm going!
Hurry up Sally, before you change your mind.
I'll just have to make the best of it.
